meta_data.title: Acknowledgments, Appendices, and SIGCHI Extended Abstracts Instructions
meta_data.abstract: This paper offers guidance on the inclusion of acknowledgments, appendices, and usage of the SIGCHI Extended Abstracts template style in research documents. It provides specific instructions on how to prepare these sections to facilitate metadata extraction and ensure formatting consistency.

high_level_summary.summary of this paper: This paper aims to guide authors in properly formatting the Acknowledgments, Appendices, and SIGCHI Extended Abstracts sections for academic documents. It describes how to ensure these sections are formatted to facilitate easy metadata extraction.
high_level_summary.research purpose: To provide formatting instructions for acknowledgments, appendices, and SIGCHI Extended Abstracts in academic papers.

conclusion.summary: The document successfully outlines approaches for including acknowledgments and appendices in a research paper while utilizing the sigchi-a template. These instructions ensure proper section formatting and uniformity across publications.
